API
===

This page contains references to the API (application programming interface), the library functions that the programmer can use to build his own scripts.

The following contents tree permit to explore the different modules and classes contained in the library. For each function there is a **[source]** button on the right the title. Clicking on it the function source code is shown.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Modules:

   dynapseNetGenerator
   dynapseOutDecoder
   dynapseSpikesGenerator
   dynapseSpikesFitter

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Classes:

   EventsSet
   InputPattern
   InputEvent
   DevicePopulation
   DeviceNeuron
   DeviceConnections
